pages.text: The $(mob)Pixie$() is a creature found in $(thing)Pixie Villages$(). It floats around, approaching nearby players that aren't looking at it to steal an item from their inventory before flying away. The item can be recovered by hitting the $(mob)Pixie$().$(p)Throwing $(item)Cake$() at a $(mob)Pixie$() tames it. Tamed $(mob)Pixies$() follow their master and grant them various buffs depending on their color, and can be healed with $(item)Sugar$().

$(mob)Pixies$() drop $(item)Pixie Dust$() on death. It can be eaten to gain $(thing)Levitation$() and $(thing)Glowing$() for a few seconds, or crafted into $(item)Ambrosia$(), which grants $(thing)Strength$(), $(thing)Absorption$(), $(thing)Jump Boost$() and $(thing)Luck$() for several minutes.

A $(mob)Pixie$() can also be trapped by using a $(item)Jar$() on it. When placed down, $(item)Pixie Dust$() can be harvested from the obtained $(item)Pixie Jar$() by right clicking on it while the $(mob)Pixie$() inside is sitting down, which can take a few days.$(p)Breaking the $(item)Pixie Jar$() releases the trapped $(mob)Pixie$().
